text: China International may refer to: * China Open (snooker), a professional snooker tournament, formerly known as "China International" * China Power International Development, a government owned company in the People's Republic of China. * China Taiping Insurance Holdings, insurance conglomerate incorporated and headquartered in Hong Kong, formerly known as "China Insurance International" * China Review International, a journal for English- language reviews of recently published China-related books and monographs * China Radio International, a state-owned media in China.
title: China International
